pros: Worked with a great boss who gave freedom and guidance to get the job done.  The team I worked on was hard working and really focused on the end result.
cons: Other departments goals conflicted with ours.  Overall the finance department seems to do the majority of the leading and it could work a bit more in tandem with other departments and be more open to change and advice.

review_title: Great place to work for support staff type people.
pros: Comfortable and challenging work environment, great benefits, decent pay. Generally good leadership. Clear direction on member focus.
cons: Most times it is unclear what is expected of you due to the "report up" structure. Great difficulty in receiving timely reviews, which wage increases are contingent upon.

review_title: Great place to launch a career in health policy
pros: Ample opportunity to grow, learn and explore different issue areas.  Work is interesting, varied and challenging.  People are generally helpful and friendly.
cons: Exempt staff work grueling hours and compensation tends to favor non-exempt employees who are eligible for overtime pay.  No work-life balance for middle managers.

pros: Professional workforce that is truly invested in providing leadership, education, quality improvements, and data analytics in New York State to ensure the health and well-being of all New Yorkers. Dedicated staff who are welcoming and engaged in doing excellent work.  Outstanding benefits.
cons: I have found no negatives to working here.

pros:
best opportunity for advancement, knowledgeable managers allows you to take on additional responsibility and authority as you can handle it.
Great benefits package. Great educational programs.Promote from within whenever possible
cons: sometimes TOO member-focused. hard to cater to all members at all times

review_title: Great benefits, fair market salaries, and professional environment
pros:
401 K sharing is outstanding. 
Company works diligently each year to present a healthy benefits package with the Employee in mind.
Can move within the organization to advance your career.
cons: Depending on your position, work life balance can be intense.

pros: Really care about their employees, company shows appreciation for hard work (employee luncheon, summer bbq, etc), and really good benefits.
cons: No easy way to get to the office, local traffic is terrible
